DOC.brief_summary: This Study evaluate possible drug interaction FosD verapamil take together .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Drug-drug Interaction Between FosD Verapamil When Taken Together Healthy Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: An Open-label , Single-Centre Study Assess Pharmacokinetics R406 Healthy Volunteers Fostamatinib Disodium 150 mg Administered Alone Combination Verapamil .
DOC.criteria: Weight least 50 kg ( 110 lb ) body mass index ( BMI ) 18 35 kg/m2 , inclusive . Females must nonchildbearing potential History clinically significant disease disorder presence GI , hepatic renal disease Any clinically significant illness , medical/surgical procedure trauma within 4 week first administration drug Any clinically significant abnormality lab safety test vital sign result judge Investigator Use prescription overthecounter drug within 2 week first administration investigational product Current smoker use nicotine product within 1 month prior enrollment
